name: 12 MiniBattles (itch)
description:
Guaranteed fun, here are 42 simple and great games head to head style to have fun with your friends. Immerse yourself in a world of pixels and fantasy where the hours will pass very fast. If you like 1vs1 games, this is for you!

As if that were not enough, the game is free, you should never pay to enjoy it. It's a pleasure for us to have you here, now to play!
